name: EUclaim B.V.
goal: EUclaim helps airline passengers claim compensation from airlines in the case of a delayed or cancelled flight. Passengers are entitled to compensation in the case of delays, cancellations or denied boarding in accordance with Regulation (EC) No 261/2004.
euInitiatives: Proposal for a REGULATION OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL amending Regulation (EC) No 261/2004 establishing common rules on Compensation and assistance to passengers in the event of denied boarding and of cancellation or long delay of flights and Regulation (EC) No 2027/97 on air carrier liability in respect of the carriage of passengers and their baggage by air
